tswitem.name: Focused Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Focused Augment Resonator
An unattuned damage augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase your critical hit chance by 1%/ 2%/ 3%/ 4%/ 5% and your critical power by 2%/ 4%/ 6%/ 8%/ 10% for this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 3 Attuned Accurate Augment Resonators
  • 12 Pure lu runes
  • 24 Pure denkyem runes
  • 60 Pure fire
